title: The NFL's best player through 14 games is ...? Barnwell stacks 15 MVP candidates and picks the winner
content: Let's make the MVP cases for 15 players -- including a ranking of the top five. Can anyone catch Matthew Stafford or Drake Maye?

title: Fowler and Graziano: Buzz on Daniel Jones, falling contenders and head coach candidates
content: What effect will Jones' injury have on the offseason QB market? Here's the latest intel heading into Week 15.

title: Moore remains in custody; no decision on charges
content: Fired Michigan coach Sherrone Moore remains in custody as officials told ESPN that they don't expect a decision on whether to file criminal charges to come Thursday.

title: NASCAR, 2 race teams settle federal antitrust case
content: NASCAR has reached a settlement of the bruising antitrust lawsuit filed against it by two of its race teams, including one co-owned by NBA great Michael Jordan.

title: IOC: Allow Russian youths to compete with flag
content: The IOC took a big step toward reintegrating Russia and Belarus into world sports Thursday by advising governing bodies to let the countries' youth teams and athletes compete with their full identity of national flag and anthem.

title: Lakers swat away playoff talk, focus on reeling D
content: LeBron James and the Lakers agreed it's too early to discuss how far the Lakers can go in the postseason, especially after the Spurs exposed their already suspect perimeter defense Wednesday to eliminate L.A. from the NBA Cup.

title: Man Utd hits record $1B debt with summer spend
content: Manchester United's net debt has broken the $1 billion barrier for the first time due to summer borrowings for player recruitment.

title: Suns' Allen ejected after shoving OKC's Holmgren
content: Suns guard Grayson Allen was ejected from an NBA Cup quarterfinal game against Oklahoma City on Wednesday night after he shoved Thunder center Chet Holmgren and knocked him to the floor.

title: OKC rolls again, ties 73-win Dubs with 24-1 start
content: The Thunder punched their ticket to Las Vegas with a 49-point blowout of the Suns in Wednesday's NBA Cup quarterfinals, matching the 2015-16 Warriors for the best 25-game start in NBA history at 24-1.

title: Crooks: 11-0 ISU 'battle-tested' after win vs. Iowa
content: Audi Crooks had another huge game in leading No. 10 Iowa State past in-state rival and No. 11 Iowa on Wednesday. After the win, which kept the Cyclones undefeated at 11-0, Crooks said, "I feel like now we're officially battle-tested."

title: üèà 2026 NFL draft: Yates' first-round projections
content: Which teams need a quarterback? Could Ohio State dominate the first round? Field Yates projects the opening 32 picks of next year's draft.

title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
content: Now that the dust has settled in Orlando, we debate our favorite (and least favorite) moves of the week -- and what's ahead this offseason.

title: What to make of the Mets losing Pete Alonso, Edwin Diaz on back-to-back days
content: Losing two faces of the franchise to free agency might feel like a gut punch, but is it a disaster for the Mets?

title: How a 28-year-old Chris Weinke became one of the most unlikely Heisman winners ever
content: After leaving pro baseball, the quarterback ignited a debate about whether his age was helping him tear up college football.

title: Five Anthony Davis trades, including a chaotic five-team blockbuster
content: With AD trade buzz ramping up, our experts propose five deals that could shift the league's balance of power.

content: The futures of Anthony Davis and Giannis Antetokounmpo are in focus. Here's everything we're hearing.

title: Which NHL player and team trends are for real? The trend-o-meter for all 32
content: From Morgan Geekie's scoring rate to the "Wall of St. Paul" and more, here's what will and won't continue.

title: Power Rankings: The 4-team race for No. 1
content: Arizona, Duke, Michigan and Iowa State each have legitimate cases to top this week's edition. Which prevailed?

title: 5 early lessons: Real vs. pretend contenders, more
content: Michigan is better than expected. Kentucky is worse. And Duke headlines an ACC that looks as if it's "back."

title: WNBA expansion draft: Predicting the five protected players on every roster
content: Teams are expected to be able to protect five players in the Portland Fire and Toronto Tempo WNBA expansion draft.

title: Jason Collins, on his cancer diagnosis: It's Stage 4 glioblastoma and I'm fighting
content: In an exclusive with ESPN, the 13-year NBA veteran and pioneer reveals that he is fighting for his life.

title: For Nebraska's Dani Busboom Kelly, home is where you hang a banner
content: Replacing legendary coach and mentor John Cook was just a step on her path to building a legend of her own.

title: Wetzel: Beware, college sports, private equity has arrived
content: The University of Utah approved a groundbreaking private equity deal. Dan Wetzel writes that big changes could follow.

title: Pulisic's form and fitness make him undroppable for the USMNT at 2026 World Cup
content: Christian Pulisic is Serie A's leading scorer, despite playing only 446 minutes. The U.S. can't afford to leave that kind of player on the bench.

title: Arsenal No. 1, Man City rising, Napoli in trouble? Champions League rerank after Matchday 6
content: Big teams have learned from last season to take the league phase more seriously, with several heavyweights cruising into the Champions League knockouts. Let's recap the surprises and rankings after Matchday 6.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Royval's path to victory at UFC Fight Night
content: Where's the value on the final UFC fight card of the year? MMA insiders and a betting expert make their picks for Brandon Royval vs. Manel Kape.

content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: Buzz: DK Metcalf expected to play Monday following injury scare
content: Metcalf (abdomen) didn't return with the Steelers after Sunday's game and instead was sent to a hospital.

title: 'Of course' it sounds crazy, but here's how the Colts unretired Philip Rivers
content: Philip Rivers hasn't taken a snap since 2020, but he might be about to enter a playoff race against elite defenses.

title: Chris Paul's 'get-better mentality' paved the way for OKC's dominance
content: Paul spent only one season in OKC but left a lasting impression on reigning MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander.

title: NBA Power Rankings: What is each team's biggest weakness?
content: NBA insiders break down the latest Power Rankings, evaluating all 30 teams as the Emirates NBA Cup heats up.

title: How each of the 12 College Football Playoff teams could win the national title
content: Bill Connelly breaks down the path to victory for every team -- and what will hold each of them back.

title: Predicting the top 5 picks in the 2026 MLB draft after White Sox win lottery
content: With Chicago landing the No. 1 overall pick for next summer, let's see how the start of the first round could go down.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea and Real Madrid eye Nottingham Forest's Murillo
content: Real Madrid and Chelsea are monitoring Nottingham Forest defender Murillo. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: 'Sign on dotted line': Goyal's msg for US after trade aide's 'best offer' remark; pact soon?
content: Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal welcomed US praise for trade deal offers, urging the US to finalize the agreement if satisfied.  Despite no timeline, Goyal highlighted ongoing discussions and the mutual benefit required for any deal.

title: 'Very warm conversation': PM Modi speaks with Donald Trump; trade, defence in focus
content: Prime Minister Modi and President Trump held a productive call, reviewing the robust India-US Comprehensive Global Strategic Partnership. Both leaders expressed satisfaction with growing bilateral cooperation and discussed enhancing trade, critical technologies, energy, and defense. They also committed to collaborating on regional and global issues, reinforcing their commitment to a deepening strategic alliance.

title: Amazon layoffs: VP explains 14,000 jobs cuts; Done to remove organisational layers
content: Amazon's senior vice president Amit Agarwal stated that recent layoffs are aimed at removing organizational layers to foster agility, enabling the company to operate like a startup in an AI-driven world. CEO Andy Jassy clarified the cuts are culture-driven, not financially or AI-driven, to streamline operations and empower employees.

title: Goa nightclub fire: How the Luthra brothers were nabbed - a timeline
content: Goa nightclub co-owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra have been detained in Phuket, Thailand, and are being deported to India for investigation into a deadly fire that killed 25 people. Indian authorities coordinated the operation after the brothers fled the country shortly after the blaze, with a police team now in Thailand to take them into custody upon their return.

title: IND vs SA: Gautam Gambhir furious as Arshdeep Singh bowls 7-wides in an over - Watch
content: Indian pacer Arshdeep Singh struggled with his line and length during the second T20I against South Africa, bowling seven wides in a single over. This costly over, which included 13 deliveries and 13 runs, drew the ire of head coach Gautam Gambhir. India, leading the series 1-0, opted to bowl first after winning the toss.

title: US-Russia flashpoint? Putin calls Maduro; reaffirms support amid Trump's rhetoric
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin reaffirmed Moscow's commitment to joint economic and energy projects with Venezuela during a call with President Nicol√°s Maduro. Putin also conveyed solidarity with Venezuela amidst US pressure, which Caracas denies is linked to drug cartels. The leaders emphasized deepening strategic cooperation, building on existing strong ties between the two nations.

title: Warning to tech giants: US attorneys general asks about chatbots; want audits
content: State attorneys general have warned 13 major tech companies, including Microsoft and Google, about the "delusional outputs" of AI chatbots. They argue these "dark patterns" pose mental health risks and violate state laws, citing incidents of murder-suicides and child exploitation. The officials demand independent audits and regulatory review of AI products.

title: Delhi riots case: Umar Khalid gets interim bail; why court gave relief
content: A Delhi court has granted interim bail to former JNU student leader Umar Khalid from December 16 to 29. This temporary relief allows him to attend his sister's wedding. Khalid, arrested under UAPA in the Delhi riots conspiracy case, will return to custody after the permitted period.

title: Gambhir's No.3 gamble fails; Axar departs cheaply in big chase
content: India's gamble of sending Axar Patel at number three backfired in the second T20I against South Africa. Patel struggled to find form, scoring 21 off 21 balls as wickets tumbled. South Africa posted a formidable 213/4, powered by Quinton de Kock's explosive 90. Varun Chakaravarthy was India's standout bowler with two wickets.

title: IND vs SA: 'Why not Samson?' - memes break internet as Gill flops again
content: Shubman Gill's T20I struggles persisted with a golden duck against South Africa, drawing criticism. Meanwhile, Quinton de Kock's explosive 90 powered the visitors to a formidable 213/4. India's bowlers, including Arshdeep Singh and Jasprit Bumrah, faced a tough outing, conceding heavily in the death overs, leaving the hosts with a challenging chase.

title: Money mistakes: Kevin O‚ÄôLeary warns consumers; the biggest financial trap people fall into unnoticed
content: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary warns homebuyers against purchasing oversized properties, calling it a significant financial pitfall. He advises keeping mortgage payments under a third of after-tax income to avoid becoming 'house poor.' O'Leary advocates for a staged approach, starting with a smaller home and upgrading later as finances strengthen, especially with current high mortgage rates.

title: Impact of new labour codes: Does your salary, PF contribution & gratuity change? Explained
content: New labour codes are set to redefine wage calculations, impacting salary structures, PF contributions, and gratuity payouts. The broader definition of 'wages' means more components will be included, potentially increasing employee benefits and employer liabilities. Fixed-term employees now qualify for gratuity after one year of service.

title: Wd, wd, wd ...: Arshdeep's over stretches to infinity; bowls 7 wides
content: Indian bowler Arshdeep Singh struggled with his line and length during the second T20I against South Africa. He bowled seven wides in a single over, conceding 18 runs. The incident occurred in the 11th over of the South African innings. Head coach Gautam Gambhir appeared displeased with the performance. India won the toss and elected to bowl in the match.

title: US to help Pak upgrade its F-16s: Trump admin clears $686m deal; a message for India?
content: The Trump administration has notified Congress of a $686 million package to modernise Pakistan's F-16 fleet, including avionics upgrades and tactical data links. This move, aimed at enhancing interoperability for counterterrorism, comes amid strained US-India ties and follows Pakistan's recent diplomatic efforts with Washington.

title: Paige Shiver‚Äôs net worth: 55% salary hike and link to Sherrone Moore scandal fuel speculation
content: University of Michigan football is in turmoil as executive assistant Paige Shiver faces intense public scrutiny. Her name is linked to former coach Sherrone Moore's firing and police detainment due to alleged inappropriate relationship rumors. Shiver's recent significant salary increase and social media silence have fueled speculation amid the ongoing investigation.

title: Candace Owens hits back as Erika Kirk urges public to stop Charlie Kirk rumors
content: Erika Kirk pleaded for privacy regarding her husband Charlie Kirk's burial site on Fox News, citing fears of grave desecration. However, Candace Owens interpreted this plea as a veiled attack, claiming Kirk's words were directed at her. Owens continues to promote unverified theories about Kirk's assassination, despite official reports pointing to a lone gunman.

title: Venus Williams & Andrea Preti net worth 2025: Career, family & business
content: Venus Williams boasts an estimated $95 million net worth in 2025, primarily from her legendary tennis career and successful fashion and design businesses. Her partner, Andrea Preti, an actor and businessman, contributes an estimated $1-2 million. Together, their combined net worth is approximately $96-97 million, reflecting their individual financial achievements.

title: PM Modi to embark on 3-country tour: Will visit Jordan, Ethiopia and Oman from Dec 15-18
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will undertake a four-day visit to Jordan, Ethiopia, and Oman from December 15-18. The trip aims to strengthen bilateral ties, explore new collaborations, and discuss regional issues, marking significant anniversaries in diplomatic relations with Jordan and Oman.

title: No relief for Goa club owners: Court denies interim bail; Thailand to deport Luthras soon
content: Delhi court denied transit anticipatory bail to Saurabh and Gaurav Luthras, owners of the Goa nightclub where a fatal fire occurred. The brothers sought protection to avoid immediate arrest upon returning from Thailand. Goa's counsel argued they were evading legal process, while the defense emphasized their willingness to cooperate with the investigation.

title: Trump's $1m Gold card: What it means for Indians, EB-5 visa aspirants; what you should know
content: US President Donald Trump has launched a new Gold Card program, requiring a $1 million donation for individuals or $2 million for corporations to gain legal status and a path to citizenship. This initiative aims to attract exceptional talent and generate government revenue, presenting an alternative to the EB-5 visa system.

title: Truck falls into gorge: 22 feared dead; authorities alerted when survivor emerges after 72hrs
content: Tragedy struck in Arunachal Pradesh as at least 22 Assam labourers are feared dead after their mini truck plunged into a deep gorge near the Indo-China border. A lone survivor, severely injured, alerted authorities after a perilous journey. Rescue operations are underway, with specialized teams and the Army working to retrieve bodies from the treacherous terrain.

title: New regional axis? B'desh hints willing to join bloc that excludes India; backs Pak's plan
content: Bangladesh's foreign affairs adviser stated it's strategically possible for Dhaka to join a regional grouping with Pakistan, excluding India, following Islamabad's signals for a trilateral initiative with China. He also noted progress on lifting US sanctions on RAB and dismissed the likelihood of further sanctions on Bangladeshi leaders.

title: Just Rs 100: ICC opens T20 World Cup ticket sales; prices set at 'historic low'
content: Ticket sales for the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2026 have opened with entry-level prices starting at Rs 100 in India and LKR 1,000 in Sri Lanka. Co-hosted by India and Sri Lanka, the tournament aims for unprecedented accessibility with over 2 million tickets available. The event will feature 20 teams playing 55 matches across eight venues.

title: ‚ÄòBirth tourism‚Äô under scrutiny: US warns tourist visas will be rejected if purpose is to give birth
content: US consular officers will now reject tourist visa applications if the primary purpose of travel is to give birth in the country for the child's US citizenship. Officials stated such travel is not permitted and will lead to visa denial, as part of a broader policy to curb birth tourism.

title: Chaos in Pakistan: Punches, kicks fly; referee assaulted - Watch
content: Chaos erupted after a National Games football semi-final in Karachi, with Pakistan Army and WAPDA players and officials involved in a violent brawl.  The altercation, captured on live broadcast and social media, saw punches and kicks exchanged.  Frustration over a penalty kick reportedly fueled the post-match aggression, leading to injuries and a pursuit of the referee.

title: Sherrone Moore scandal: Detention, alleged affair and scrutiny on wife Kelli
content: The Sherrone Moore scandal escalated as Michigan fired him for cause after an inappropriate relationship with a staff member and police later detained him in Saline. The fallout includes scrutiny of his wife, speculation around staffer involvement, and Michigan naming Biff Poggi interim head coach while law enforcement reviews potential charges amid Paige Shiver pregnancy rumors.

title: Uttar Pradesh: Fake, drunk doc performs surgery watching YouTube; woman dies
content: A woman died in Barabanki after an illegal clinic owner and his nephew allegedly performed surgery on her while watching a YouTube video. The clinic operator, described as a 'quack', reportedly operated under the influence of alcohol, leading to a fatal incision. A case has been registered, and efforts are underway to apprehend the absconding accused.

title: 2nd T20I: 2011 WC hero joins India's huddle in Mullanpur; pics go viral
content: Cricket legend Yuvraj Singh energised Team India's pre-match moments ahead of the second T20I against South Africa. Following a dominant 101-run victory in the opener, where Hardik Pandya starred with an all-round performance and Jasprit Bumrah reached 100 T20I wickets, the squad received a motivational boost. Yuvraj's presence aims to sustain India's winning momentum in Mullanpur.

title: Mass visa chaos: H-1B families stranded in India; US consulates cancel interviews
content: Hundreds of Indian H-1B visa holders and their families are stranded in India due to a new US Department of State policy mandating social-media screening. This has led to mass cancellations and rescheduling of visa appointments, pushing many into 2026, jeopardizing jobs and disrupting family lives.

title: CBI cracks Rs 1000cr crypto scam: 2 Chinese nationals, 150 shell accounts exposed
content: CBI has charged 30 individuals, including two Chinese nationals, in a massive Rs 1,000-crore crypto-investment scam.  The accused allegedly used a fake app, 'HPZ Tokens', to dupe investors with promises of huge returns on non-existent bitcoin-mining machines.  This sophisticated cyber-crime network, operated from abroad, exploited India's payment aggregation system to launder funds.

title: Split coaching: Ex-captain responds after Gambhir's 'stick to domain' remark
content: Kapil Dev dismissed the idea of split coaches for Indian cricket following their Test series loss to South Africa. He emphasized that the BCCI should adopt the system best suited for Indian cricket. Dev also commented on the unchanging nature of sporting challenges and player priorities regarding T20 leagues versus national duty.

title: Stefon Diggs reacts to Cardi B‚Äôs bold green bob and leather look on Miami night out
content: Cardi B and Stefon Diggs are solidifying their status as a prominent NFL power couple, recently showcasing their public affection during a Miami girls' night. Diggs' viral comment on Cardi's vibrant green bob and stylish outfit highlighted their growing comfort in sharing intimate moments online, reinforcing their strong connection amid recent celebrations and new beginnings.

title: ODI series win: Ex-KKR teammate asks why Gambhir did not 'credit' Rohit, Virat - 'Felt strange'
content: Former India batter Robin Uthappa expressed surprise at head coach Gautam Gambhir not mentioning Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's stellar performances after India's ODI series win.  Despite their significant contributions, Uthappa found Gambhir's silence unusual, especially given the senior players' consistent form. He added that both senior players delivered strong performances.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Luthra brothers misled police - what cops told court
content: Goa police informed a Delhi court that nightclub co-owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra misled investigators and showed no cooperation after the deadly fire that killed 25. The brothers, who fled to Thailand, are seeking anticipatory bail, but police argue their actions disentitle them to such protection. The investigation into the blaze continues.

title: Sex, lies, video: How 100-member spy-cam gang targeted Delhi cops
content: A sophisticated crime syndicate in Delhi used hidden cameras in commercial vehicles to record traffic police, then doctored footage for blackmail and extortion. The gang, led by Raju Meena and Jeeshan Ali, also lodged false corruption complaints against targeted officers and even demanded sexual favors from female personnel, causing significant distress and forcing transfers.

title: Goa fire fallout: Thailand treaty & how Luthras will be sent back ‚Äî deportation playbook
content: Co-owners of the 'Birch by Romeo Lane' nightclub, Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, are set to be extradited to India from Thailand after fleeing following a fire that claimed 25 lives. Detained in Phuket, their extradition highlights the India-Thailand Extradition Treaty, which facilitates the surrender of fugitive offenders.

title: Kolhapuri chappal row: Prada to team up with Indian artisans; launch limited-edition sandals
content: Prada is collaborating with Indian artisans for a limited-edition sandal collection, following criticism for designs resembling traditional Kolhapuri chappals.  The luxury brand will produce 2,000 pairs in Maharashtra and Karnataka, blending Indian craftsmanship with Italian techniques. This initiative aims to elevate global recognition for the craft and ensure fair compensation for artisans.

title: 'Under pressure, hands trembling': Rahul takes dig at Shah over Lok Sabha speech ‚Äî watch
content: Rahul Gandhi accused Home Minister Amit Shah of appearing nervous and using foul language during his Lok Sabha speech on electoral reforms. Gandhi challenged Shah to a debate on his press conference allegations, but Shah stated Parliament would not function according to Gandhi's wishes.

title: IGPL tour: Pranavi creates history; first Indian woman to win professional golf title against men
content: Pranavi Urs made history at the IGPL Invitational Mumbai, becoming the first Indian woman to win a professional golf event in an open field against men. Shooting a bogey-free 8-under 60, she overtook overnight leader Karandeep Kochhar to claim the title. Her breakthrough highlights the growing strength of women‚Äôs golf in India and challenges longstanding gender norms in sport.

title: IND vs SA: 'He's scared of Yuvraj' - The tough-love mentorship behind Abhishek Sharma's rise
content: Abhishek Sharma's rapid rise to international cricket is attributed to his rigorous childhood training and the strict mentorship of Yuvraj Singh. His father and coaches recall his dedication from a young age, with Yuvraj's tough love continuing to shape his game, even influencing his adoption of golf to refine his batting.

title: Skydiver left hanging from plane tail; video shows dramatic escape ‚Äî watch
content: A terrifying mid-air ordeal unfolded for an Australian skydiver when their reserve parachute snagged on a plane's tail during a formation jump.  Dangling thousands of feet above ground, the skydiver ingeniously used a hook knife to free themselves before safely deploying their main parachute. The incident also impacted the aircraft, causing damage and a mayday call.

title: Exclusive: 'Bowling fast helps me pay my rent' - Lockie Ferguson
content: Desert Vipers skipper Lockie Ferguson reflects on the ILT20‚Äôs rapid growth and the value it brings to the UAE and Associate players. He discusses New Zealand‚Äôs sporting culture, the realities of injury setbacks, and why fast bowlers form a unique global brotherhood. Ferguson also addresses the challenge of flat pitches, evolving T20 skills, and the constant pursuit of pace.

title: Even Before Goa Fire, Luthras' Romeo Lane Chain Faced Many Complaints, Fines
content: The Romeo Lane chain of restaurants and clubs, under intense scrutiny after 25 people died in a fire at its Goa nightclub, Birch by Romeo Lane, has a history of complaints and fines for allegedly violating environmental norms in Goa and Uttarakhand.

title: Delhi Redraws Map, Will Now Have 13 Districts Instead Of 11
content: In a major administrative reboot, the Delhi Cabinet on Wednesday approved redrawing of the Capital's revenue map, expanding the city from 11 to 13 revenue districts.

title: Luthra Brothers Were At Delhi Wedding When Fire Ravaged Goa Club
content: Shortly after getting information about the fire at Birch By Romeo Lane, Saurav and Gaurav Luthra made hurried plans to travel to Thailand.

title: PM Modi Hosts NDA MPs For Dinner At His Residence In Delhi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday hosted a dinner for MPs belonging to the National Democratic Alliance constituents (NDA) at his residence here.

title: Chandrayaan-3 Finds Active Electrical Environment Near Moon's South Pole
content: Chandrayaan-3 has uncovered a "far more active" and dynamic electrical environment near the Moon's south pole than previously understood, new analysis of data from the lander has revealed.

title: Over 6,700 Indians, Lured By Scam Centres, Rescued From Cambodia, Myanmar
content: The Centre on Thursday informed the Parliament that it has taken notice of instances of dubious firms involved in fake recruitment job offers.

title: Opinion: Blog | The Real Ikkis Story: The 21-Year-Old Who Kept Pak Away From Jammu In 1971
content: Khetarpal denied the Pakistan Army a vital breakthrough on December 17, 1971, on India's western border, and kept them from gaining control of the road to Jammu. Indira Gandhi wrote a heartfelt letter to his father, honouring his bravery.

title: After 23 Years, Widow Gets Rs 8.92 Lakh Compensation Thanks To Court's Nudge
content: Railways finally managed to trace and pay Rs 8.92 lakh as compensation to a tragedy-struck widow, who lost her husband in a train accident in 2002, after the Supreme Court's nudge.

title: India Calls for 'Pragmatic' Engagement With Taliban At UN Security Council
content: India has urged the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) to adopt a practical and balanced approach while dealing with the Taliban, saying engagement must focus on encouraging positive steps rather than relying only on punitive measures.

title: PM Modi, US President Donald Trump Discuss Trade, Energy And Defence
content: As speculation about an imminent trade deal between the two countries gathers steam, Prime Minister Narendra Modi and US President Donald Trump spoke over the phone on Thursday and discussed expanding cooperation in various areas.

title: Families Of Doctors Who Died On Covid Duty Entitled To Government Insurance: Top Court
content: The court said individual claims for insurance made under the PMGKY-Package will be considered and decided in accordance with the law and on the basis of evidence.

title: Tariffs Cause $1,200 Price Hike For Every US Household Since Trump's Return
content: Sweeping taxes on imports have cost the average American household nearly $1,200 since Donald Trump returned to the White House this year, according to calculations by Democrats on Congress' Joint Economic Committee.

title: 31 Killed In Military Air Strike On Hospital In Myanmar
content: A Myanmar military air strike killed more than 30 people at a hospital, aid workers said Thursday, as the junta wages a withering offensive ahead of elections beginning this month.

title: When Duty Called, Dharmendra Flew 18 Hours In Agony To Stand With His Party
content: At a special prayer meeting held in Delhi to pay tribute to the legendary Dharmendra, his associate of 21 years, Sudhir Kumar Singh, opened his heart and took everyone back to a moment that revealed the real He-Man - not just the reel one.

title: Minutes After Stealing Gold, Cash, Karnataka Thief Robbed By 4 Men
content: Minutes after stealing 90 grams of gold, Rs 1.75 lakh cash and then committing two more burglaries, the thief was going robbed near the Mandur crematorium.

title: Over 89,000 CCTV Cameras Installed In Maharashtra Schools: Minister
content: The Maharashtra government reiterated their commitment to enhancing child safety in schools across the state, highlighting the successful installation of CCTV cameras in over 89,000 educational institutions

title: New Photo Shows Luthra Brothers At Thai Immigration Control Centre
content: A new photo of the Luthra brothers surrounded by Thai officials at an immigration facility has emerged. The two were detained from their hotel room in Thailand following a request from India.

title: Kolhapuri Chappals Can Hit $1 Billion Exports After Prada Deal: Piyush Goyal
content: After a massive global controversy over Prada's Kolhapuri-inspired sandals, a massive collaboration between Prada and Kolhapuri Chappals has been announced.

title: Explained: Why Delhi NCR Is Not Experiencing The Signature Winter Cold Wave
content: A third of December has already passed, but the intense winter chill has not yet arrived in the Delhi-NCR region.

title: 2 Hyderabad Men Die After Injecting Stolen Surgical Anaesthesia Drug
content: Investigation revealed that the anaesthesia drug was stolen from a private hospital, highlighting a critical lapse in the handling of controlled substances.

title: Supreme Court constitutes SIT to probe unnatural death of SC youth in Madhya Pradesh
content: The deceased‚Äôs widow and brother gave conflicting statements about who was responsible for the tragedy.

title: Supreme Court declines to transfer trial of Prajwal Revanna
content: Counsel sought the transfer on the basis of certain observations made by Special Judge in his August 1 judgment convicting Revanna in an earlier sexual assault case

title: Supreme Court panel to conceptualise, implement, monitor AI use in judiciary, Law Minister tells RS
content: e-Courts project includes ‚Çπ53.57 cr for future tech, including AI and blockchain; AI tools to boost administrative efficiency, predict case pendency, automate processes, streamline court operations, Minister says

title: PM Modi to visit Jordan, Ethiopia, Oman from December 15 to 18
content: In the first leg of his trip, PM Modi will visit Jordan from December 15 to 16 at the invitation of King Abdullah II bin Al Hussein to review the entire gamut of bilateral relations and exchange perspectives on regional issues.

title: Srinagar homestay owner booked for hosting Chinese national
content: The police lodged a FIR (First Information Report) under Sections 8 and 23(b) of the Immigration and Foreigners Act, 2025

title: 76.08% vote in second phase of local body polls,  Kerala records overall turnout of 73.69%
content: Thrissur, Palakkad, Malappuram, Kozhikode, Wayanad, Kannur and Kasaragod went to the polls on Thursday (December 11) and 1.16 crore of the 1.53 crore voters in these districts exercised their right to vote.

title: Kozhikode records 77.24% voter turnout in local body polls
content: Kozhikode¬†Corporation registered 69.55% polling; Ramanattukara¬†posted the highest polling percentage of 81.39 among municipalities, while¬†Payyoli recorded the lowest  of 76.53%

title: SC says ‚Äòmigration‚Äô in SIR order may include crossings into India
content: Bench questions scope of Election Commission‚Äôs citizenship verification under nationwide SIR exercise

title: Government refutes Rahul Gandhi‚Äôs charge on exclusion of the marginalised for top posts
content: Sources confirmed that for the eight vacancies as Information Commissioners, the government had recommended one name from the SC community, one from the ST community, one member from the Other Backward Classes¬†and a member of a minority community, and a woman

title: Indian Medical Parliamentarians‚Äô Forum flags acute crisis in care for children with rare lysosomal disorders
content: In a submission to Prime Minister, the forum has warned that treatment interruptions under the National Policy for Rare Diseases have placed dozens of young patients at immediate and preventable risk

title: President Murmu visits Manipur amid shutdown
content: After the capital of the conflict-scarred State, she is scheduled to visit Senapati district to inaugurate various developmental projects

title: NIMHANS paper highlights role of digital tools in strengthening campus mental health systems
content: The publication says higher education institutions must put in place clear policies on data governance, privacy and confidentiality, and ensure transparency around digital offerings

title: Watch: Historic chaos in Maharashtra Assembly: No opposition leader for the first time
content: In this episode of Pulse Maharashtra, we decode the unprecedented turmoil in the winter session: why both Houses currently lack an LOP, how the 10% convention is being interpreted, and what the number game looks like (Shiv Sena UBT, Congress, NCP‚ÄìSP).

title: Redeploy non-Hindus in non-religious positions, government tells TTD
content: The TTD administration is also contemplating introducing Voluntary Retirement Scheme by working out a lucrative package for them

title: Punishment for forcibly administering acid must be stricter than under UAPA : SC
content: ‚ÄúThese people who exhibit such barbarism on a fellow human being have no right to roam around in society; they are a threat to society and to the rule of the law,‚Äù says Chief Justice Surya Kant

title: Three men strangled to death as tantrik‚Äôs ‚Äòmoney multiplier‚Äô spell goes awry
content: The victims had asked the tantrik and his accomplices to conduct a jhadan, an occult procedure, which multiplies money

title: Palakkad sees 76.23% voter turnout
content: Among the seven municipalities in the district, Chittur-Thathamangalam municipality registers highest polling percentage at 81.41%, while the  Palakkad municipality registers the lowest polling percentage at 65.08%

title: TTD mulls expansion of recycling machines in Tirumala
content: Swachh Tirumala must evolve into a collective civic movement, says TTD Additional Executive Officer Ch. Venkaiah Chowdary

title: Copyright Act likely to be amended to address AI issues within three years, DPIIT official says
content: DPIIT working paper proposes ‚Äúblanket licensing‚Äù, to let AI firms train LLMs by scraping the internet,  pay royalties to a copyright society once models are commercialised; firms say publishers should be able to opt out

title: Info from Tasmac MD‚Äôs mobile phone revealed involvement of Akash Baskaran, ED tells Madras High Court
content: It, however, adds that all action related to Tasmac money laundering probe had been put on hold pursuant to interim orders passed by the Supreme Court

title: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu promises support to Amaravati Quantum BioFoundry
content: He reaffirms the government‚Äôs commitment to promote frontier technologies and provide conditions that attract global investments and innovation

title: Startup ideas must meet global standards: SVU RUSA CEO
content: Students asked to explore new entrepreneurial opportunities by utilising creativity and skills instead of depending solely on traditional job roles

title: A.P. achieves record paddy procurement, says Civil Supplies Minister Nadendla Manohar
content: A quantity of 1,71,651 MT of paddy has already been despatched to the Food Corporation of India, he says

title: YSRCP raises concern over electoral irregularities, opposes SIR
content: In Rajya Sabha, its member Subba Reddy demands mandatory release of all polling records, strict EVM verification, full webcasting, and a national debate on paper ballot

title: Parental involvement key to student well-being in Thiruvananthapuram coastal schools
content: Changathi project, a bio-psycho-social intervention project launched by NGO Kanal in 2023, shows parental involvement is closely linked to issues identified among students such as psycho-social difficulties, nutritional deficiencies, and academic neglect.

title: SC terms Governor-CM spat over V-C appointments in Kerala a ‚Äòdeadlock‚Äô, turns to Justice Dhulia panel again
content: The court tasked the committee to provide, in a sealed cover, names for V-C appointments to each university in the order of preference; it listed the case for hearing next on December 18

title: The Hindu in School Science Festival in Hubballi on December 20
content: The event that features an inter-school competition to nurture scientific curiosity and mathematical talent among students will be held at Hebasur Bhavan on Gokul Road in Hubballi

title: Yathindra stokes power tussle fire yet again, says his father will stay on for full term
content: This is the second time in a week that the MLC and son of Siddaramaiah has expressed confidence about his father completing his full term

title: BRS opposes Draft Seeds Bill, urges Centre not to hand over control to corporate firms
content: Party working president KTR wants provisions to ensure compensation to ryots who suffer loss due to spurious seed in a time frame

title: BJP has ‚Çπ10,107 crore in election account, 75 times more than Congress‚Äôs funds, says Ajay Maken in Rajya Sabha
content: Initiating the debate on election reforms in Rajya Sabha, Congress MP Ajay Maken says in the past 20 years since 2004, the BJP‚Äôs bank balance had increased from ‚Çπ87.96 crore to ‚Çπ10,107.2 crore and that of the Congress from ‚Çπ38.48 crore to ‚Çπ133.97 crore

title: Flight cancellations hit tourism in Munnar during peak season
content: Nearly 30% to 40% of hotel and homestay bookings have been cancelled in Munnar, with many stakeholders suffered a loss of ‚Çπ1.5 lakh a day. North Indian tourists visit the hill station in December-January when winter sets in

title: Kerala local body elections 2025: Thrissur logs 72.27% turnout; polling largely peaceful across district
content: Despite minor scuffles, technical delays, and isolated complaints, voter response remained strong across 111 local bodies

title: At IFFK 2025 curtain-raiser, spotlight on resilience and the festival‚Äôs impact on Malayalam cinema
content: The 30th edition of festival features 206 films from 82 countries, including the premiere of¬†Palestine 36.¬†The festival honours Mauritanian¬†filmmaker¬†Abderrahmane¬†Sissakko¬†with a Lifetime Achievement Award.

title: Defence experts term Russia India‚Äôs most reliable military partner
content: Experts noted that additional S-400 missile systems will significantly bolster India‚Äôs air defence capabilities, while discussions on the advanced S-500 system signal the next phase of strategic cooperation

title: Aadhaar app to encourage offline sharing by only exposing minimal data: UIDAI CEO
content: UIDAI CEO Bhuvnesh Kumar tells The Hindu that the new Aadhaar mobile app, which the public has been invited to try out, will reduce the data they need to share in public

title: PM Modi and U.S. President Trump hold telephone conversation
content: Phone call happened just days after Russian President Vladmir Putin visited New Delhi; Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) says the conversation dealt with bilateral relations as well as ‚Äòkey regional and global developments‚Äô

title: Navy Chief in Brazil to strengthen India Brazil defence cooperation
content: Admiral Tripathi holds high-level meetings in Brasilia to deepen defence partnership and maritime security cooperation

title: Existing labour courts, industrial tribunals to continue till new ones formed: Govt to Delhi HC
content: The Bench had said it appeared that prima facie, the provisions permitting smooth transition for the new labour code have not been thought of by the central government; as a result, the labour disputes remain unattended, which might have arisen on or before November 21.

title: Nellore Collector ranks second in clearance of files in A.P.

title: Bids received for Kasaragod water aerodrome project during UDAN 5.5 bidding

title: Rivers could join exclusive list of athletes to suit up while being a grandparent
content: rivers retired from professional football after a 17-year career . he will be re-signing with the Indianapolis Colts . rivers' eldest daughter is a few months older than the 23-year-old rookie .

title: The most impactful women's recruit on every 2026 top-25 class roster

title: US plan for Russia-Ukraine peace: Europe bristles; why it may be a boon for India
content: the proposals set out an ambitious postwar reconstruction program for Ukraine funded by frozen Russian assets, and a roadmap for returning Russia to the global economy through extensive US-led investment . one proposal calls for building a vast US-operated data-center complex powered by the Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant, currently under Russian occupation .

title: Don't turn Liverpool chaos into Slot vs. Salah: Club bosses must step in
content: the current situation at the club is being framed in the simplest terms: Mohamed Salah vs. Arne Slot . it feels downright puerile, something straight out of the schoolyard, with fans and media playing the role of parents . slot blames little Mo for his student's poor test scores and kicks him out of class .

title: Men's class rankings: USC into top 10; Tennessee and Texas A&M join
content: the biggest winner of this most recent update was USC . both of their signees made enormous leaps in the player rankings . the Trojans jumped from no. 24 all the way to no. 9 despite not adding any commitments .

title: Ten (maybe 11) players to watch at NCAA volleyball tournament's Sweet 16
content: the 2025 NCAA volleyball tournament is down to its final 16 teams . can Nebraska, the no. 1 overall seed, finish undefeated and claim the program's sixth national title? will Kentucky return to the final four for the first time since winning its first national championship in 2020?

title: In a lost season, Falcons' rookie pass rushers offer hope for the future
content: two players from the same place who play the same position were both drafted by the same team in the first round . "Knew this was home for us," pearce says . the Falcons are hoping to make a move to the u.s. in 2025 .

title: Everything to know from Thunder and Spurs advancing to Las Vegas
content: the defending NBA champion beat the Phoenix Suns 138-89 . the victory marked the Thunder's 16th straight of the season . they also boast a 24-1 record, tying the 2015-16 Golden State Warriors with the best 25-game start in NBA history .

title: Bucs' Creamsicles, Falcons' throwbacks top Week 15 uniforms
content: the Buccaneers will wear their popular "Creamsicle" uniforms against the Atlanta Falcons on "Thursday Night Football" the combination has the iconic "Bucco Bruce" logo on the white helmets . the new york Giants wore these uniforms from 1980 to 1999 .

title: Taliban, TTP & Balochistan: The three-body problem facing Pak - explained
content: the reality is far more chaotic and intricate, much like the scientific conundrum known as the "three-body problem" this problem deals with predicting the motions of three gravitational bodies interacting with each other . the paradox is that introducing a third body creates a system so unstable and non-linear that exact forecasts become practically impossible .
